trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class with the provided data source designer and view name.
The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a sorted view of the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
The minimum number of rows to return.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
The data to display at design time.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*> property contains an object that derives from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*> property is derived from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*> property returns a <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> type.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*> property returns a <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
An object that represents the schema.
